fields.label: NELA Gala Event Display Mode
fields.name: full_event_switch
fields.message: Turn this off to show only a "Save the Date card on the page

fields.label: Brief Schedule (one line only)
fields.name: datetime_detail
fields.instructions: This is a short, single line summary of the event times. It displays along the bottom of the header

fields.label: Venue Name
fields.name: nelagala_venue_name
fields.instructions: Used in the header section at the top of the page. Do not use all caps.
fields.default_value: Ronald Reagan Building and International Trade Center
fields.placeholder: Name of Venue or location of event

fields.label: Text above venue name in header
fields.name: header_venue_message
fields.instructions: Leave blank to use theme name from the sidebar above.

fields.label: Event Theme
fields.name: theme_sidebar_title
fields.instructions: The theme sidebar appears inside the sidebar box to the right of the main event description content at the top of the page (on desktop and large tablet display — underneath on mobile and portrait-orientations).
fields.default_value: Celebrate the Region of Sicily with us

fields.label: Theme Sidebar Content
fields.name: theme_sidebar_content
fields.instructions: Add text and images to illustrate the theme, but be aware of size constraints. This sidebar only displays full-width on small screens such as mobile phones. On the desktop and horizontal tablets, this content is only rendered at 30% of the main content area.

fields.label: Theme Sidebar Image
fields.name: theme_sidebar_image
fields.instructions: This optional image will be displayed at the top of the theme sidebar at the top of the page. Optimal image size would be 600px wide at a 16:9 or 5:4 aspect ratio.
fields.mime_types: png, jpeg, jpg, svg, webp, gif, heic

fields.label: Google API Key
fields.name: google_api_key
fields.instructions: Required for rendering Google Maps and providing geolocation data.

fields.label: Google Geocoding API Key
fields.name: google_geocoding_api_key
fields.instructions: Required for rendering Google Maps and providing geolocation data.

fields.label: Venue and Lodging Section Menu Item Label
fields.name: lodging_sidebar_link_label

fields.label: Lodging Section Content
fields.name: lodging_section_top_content
fields.instructions: This content will go below the section title, and above the rows of participants listed.

fields.label: Roles Section Content
fields.name: roles_section_content
fields.instructions: This content will go below the section title, and above the rows of participants listed.

fields.label: Role Participants
fields.name: roles
fields.instructions: Participants are chosen from items selected from the “Participants” list. All participants must be added using the NELA Gala Participants dashboard before adding them to an event.

fields.label: Honorees Section Content
fields.name: honorees_section_content
fields.instructions: This content will go below the section title, and above the rows of participants listed.

fields.label: Honored Guests
fields.name: honorees
fields.instructions: Participants are chosen from items selected from the “Participants” list. All participants must be added using the NELA Gala Participants dashboard before adding them to an event.

fields.label: Ticket Section Content
fields.name: ticket_section_top_content
fields.instructions: This content will go below the section title, and above the rows of participants listed.

fields.label: Sponsorship Section Content
fields.name: sponsorship_section_top_content
fields.instructions: This content will go below the section title, and above the rows of participants listed.

fields.label: Section Content
fields.name: advertising_section_top_content
fields.instructions: This content will go below the section title, and above the rows of participants listed.
